alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 10:54AM EST until January 17 at 7:36PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River At Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...From this morning to early this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Minor flooding of lowlands, boat docks and boat launches. Water covers State Route 213 in Eddyville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - This river is currently around 5.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will reach a maximum value of 5.6 feet late this morning. It will fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.2 feet on 10/25/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 5.0 Observed Stage: 5.3 Forecast: Mon 11 am 5.6 Mon 5 pm 2.6 Mon 11 pm 2.0 Tue 5 am -1.2 Tue 11 am 1.3 Tue 5 pm -0.6 Tue 11 pm 0.6 Wed 5 am -0.4 Wed 11 am 2.2 &&
